H0.text: What is the force that opposes the relative motion of two bodies that are in contact. Viscosity

H1.text: What is the force that opposes the relative motion of two bodies that are in contact. Adhesion

H2.text: What is the force that opposes the relative motion of two bodies that are in contact. Gravity

H3.text: What is the force that opposes the relative motion of two bodies that are in contact. Friction

A4.text: Dry friction is a force that opposes the relative lateral motion of two solid surfaces in contact.

A5.text: Fluid friction describes the friction between layers of a viscous fluid that are moving relative to each other.

A6.text: Coefficients of friction – tables of coefficients, plus many links

A7.text: Values for Coefficient of Friction – CRC Handbook of Chemistry and Physics
